name: SOLITUNE
description: SOLITUNE is a very short game about escapism. You become a shepherd and collect your flock on the way out of your old life. Solve a puzzle in every room to earn a sheep to find your way out.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: i3, 2GhZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Card with Shader Model 3 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
